name: Dungeons Of Kremlin: Remastered
description: Dungeons Of Kremlin: Remastered is a throwback classic first person shooter game like Wolfenstein 3D, Doom or Hexen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Atom N570 1.66 GHz and better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 3150 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 37 MB available space
